title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 6, 2024
description: All solutions for the November 6 episode. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 6, 2024 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle for November 6, 2024, along with the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll see the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer for November 6, 2024. We’ll also share the solutions for all the other toss-ups and standard puzzles throughout the episode, but we’ll highlight the main bonus round answer first. Tonight’s match will feature three new contestants: Barbara Hamilton-Mbambara, Alicia Slagle, and Dean Schansinger. Longtime fans who aren’t as thrilled with the new host Ryan Seacrest for Season 42 will want to jot down December 2 on their calendar. That is when Pat Sajak will return for a comeback just for one night of Celebrity Wheel of Fortune before its full season starts later in 2025. Here are all of the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 6. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Wednesday, November 6, 2024 and the categories (in parentheses) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – MAKING THE ROUNDS (What Are You Doing?) Tossup #1 – BACKSTAGE PAGE (Showbiz) Tossup #2 – LIFE IN THE FAST LANE (Song Title) Regular Puzzle #1 – DALLAS, HOUSTON & LUBBOCK, TEXAS (On the Map) Regular Puzzle #2 – SISTER, LEBOWSKI, SHOT, EASY (Crossword: Big ____?) Regular Puzzle #3 – WALKING ACROSS THE BROOKLYN BRIDGE (What Are You Doing?) Tossup #3 – THE CRACK OF DAWN (Event) Tossup #4 – SPECTACULAR SUNSET (Event) Tossup #5 – TOTAL SOLAR ECLIPSE (Event) Regular Puzzle #4 – IT ALL ADDS UP (Phrase) As a recap of yesterday’s episode, here are the puzzle answers for Tuesday, November 5: Bonus Round Puzzle – QUICK QUESTION FOR YOU (Phrase) Tossup #1 – BUSTLING WITH ACTIVITY (Phrase) Tossup #2 – FASHION DESIGNER (Occupation) Regular Puzzle #1 – EMPIRE STATE OF MIND (Song Title) Regular Puzzle #2 – CHICAGO & TEDDY BEARS (Same Name) Regular Puzzle #3 – CHERRY BLOSSOM SEASON (Event) Tossup #3 – WASHING MY HAIR (What Are You Doing?) Tossup #4 – WASHING MY CAR (What Are You Doing?) Tossup #5 – WASHING MY DOG (What Are You Doing?) Regular Puzzle #4 – CULINARY CREATIONS (Food & Drink) The Fan Friday contest is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be available on November 8 this week.
html:
Here you’ll see the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer for November 6, 2024. We’ll also share the solutions for all the other toss-ups and standard puzzles throughout the episode, but we’ll highlight the main bonus round answer first. Tonight’s match will feature three new contestants: Barbara Hamilton-Mbambara, Alicia Slagle, and Dean Schansinger.

Longtime fans who aren’t as thrilled with the new host Ryan Seacrest for Season 42 will want to jot down December 2 on their calendar. That is when Pat Sajak will return for a comeback just for one night of Celebrity Wheel of Fortune before its full season starts later in 2025. Here are all of the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 6.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Wednesday, November 6, 2024 and the categories (in parentheses) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – MAKING THE ROUNDS (What Are You Doing?)
  • Tossup #1 – BACKSTAGE PAGE (Showbiz)
  • Tossup #2 – LIFE IN THE FAST LANE (Song Title)
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – DALLAS, HOUSTON & LUBBOCK, TEXAS (On the Map)
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – SISTER, LEBOWSKI, SHOT, EASY (Crossword: Big ____?)
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – WALKING ACROSS THE BROOKLYN BRIDGE (What Are You Doing?)
  • Tossup #3 – THE CRACK OF DAWN (Event)
  • Tossup #4 – SPECTACULAR SUNSET (Event)
  • Tossup #5 – TOTAL SOLAR ECLIPSE (Event)
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – IT ALL ADDS UP (Phrase)

As a recap of yesterday’s episode, here are the puzzle answers for Tuesday, November 5:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – QUICK QUESTION FOR YOU (Phrase)
  • Tossup #1 – BUSTLING WITH ACTIVITY (Phrase)
  • Tossup #2 – FASHION DESIGNER (Occupation)
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – EMPIRE STATE OF MIND (Song Title)
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – CHICAGO & TEDDY BEARS (Same Name)
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – CHERRY BLOSSOM SEASON (Event)
  • Tossup #3 – WASHING MY HAIR (What Are You Doing?)
  • Tossup #4 – WASHING MY CAR (What Are You Doing?)
  • Tossup #5 – WASHING MY DOG (What Are You Doing?)
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – CULINARY CREATIONS (Food & Drink)

The Fan Friday contest is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be available on November 8 this week.
